content:
This weeks playlist was dedicated to the music of Edgar Meyer worldrenowned double bassist who was an artist in residence at the LSU School of Music from Jan PERIOD twenty-sixth till Jan PERIOD twenty-eighth and to Russian music in support of the LSU Symphony performance this Thursday Feb fourth which will feature various Russian compositions PERIOD
